name: Name
complete_shipping_message: Complete the shipping form to see the shipping methods.
c2p_consent: By entering your email, you consent and direct firmly to send your information to Click to Pay to check if you have any saved cards
validation_name_first_last: Name must contain at least a first and last name
validation_name_invalid: Name must be a valid string
validation_email_invalid: Email must be a valid email address
validation_email_string: Email must be a valid string
validation_value_string: Value must be a valid string
validation_phone_format: Phone number must be a valid format
validation_phone_string: Phone number must be a valid string
validation_zip_format: Zip code must be a valid format
validation_zip_string: Zip code must be a valid string
validation_address_format: Address must be a valid format
validation_address_string: Address must be a valid string
billing_address_same: Billing address is the same as shipping address
validation_card_format: Card number must be a valid format
validation_card_string: Card number must be a valid string
validation_expiration_date_format: Expiration date must be in the format MM/YY
validation_expiration_date_string: Expiration date must be a valid string
validation_cvc_format: CVC must be a valid format
validation_cvc_string: CVC must be a valid string
paypal_redirect: You will be redirected to Paypal to authenticate. You will be redirected back to our site to complete your order.
marketing_consent: I agree to receive marketing communications
